text:
Suggestion to improve work with FontAwesome icons

Is it possible to align names used in HubSpot with the ones in FontAwesome library?
Today, Iâ€™ve been using names from FontAwesome website not considering they might differ drastically.
So the difference was found after rounds of trials. Perhaps having a list of names in the documentation would be a quick solution. What do you think <@U7SL518D6>?
